alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 5:44AM CDT until June 19 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Central Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Southern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 544 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beauregard, or 8 miles southeast of Hazlehurst, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rockport around 550 AM CDT. Sontag and Oma around 555 AM CDT. Wanilla around 600 AM CDT. Monticello around 605 AM CDT. Silver Creek around 610 AM CDT. Arm around 615 AM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
